So maybe (a) don't tweet pictures of dead people, (b) don't be racist af, (c) don't do terrorists' work for them. Just a few suggestions.
This is not only shit, it's exactly what the terrorists want us to think. They want to divide us. They want us to help spread their hatred.
Implying open immigration policies lead to terrorist attacks assumes immigrants are inherently violent, aggressive, and alien.
Tweeting pictures of dead bodies without warning to make a point about "the consequences of open immigration" is gross & also really racist.
They will absolutely weasel-word you into accepting full-blown Nazism. The time to be rude and loud and swift in condemnation is now.
Never trust someone who tries to downplay the effects of brutal authoritarian oppression as "problems with implementation"
Never let someone tell you that your reaction to brutal authoritarian oppression should be "more considered".
